text: As women come forward to accuse Harvey Weinstein of sexual misconduct, they paint an increasingly clear picture of the once - powerful studio executive ’ s disturbing predatory behavior. “ Game of Thrones ” star Lena Headey shared her own Weinstein story in a series of notes posted to Twitter on Tuesday. The actress, who has earned three Emmy nominations for her role as Cersei Lannister in the HBO hit series, said the Miramax co - founder made sexual advances toward her after their first meeting at the Venice Film Festival. Headey was attending to promote the Weinstein - produced film “ Brothers Grimm, ” which screened there in September 2005. “ At one point Harvey asked me to take a walk down to the water, ” she began. “ I walked down with him and he stopped and made some suggestive comment
